column15: HX One does not need to be in FLUX Mode
When Settings > Pedal Jack is set to "ExpFS4"

column5: Controls duration of on-state in Flux mode
Controls response curve for on-state in Flux mode
column16: 0-4: Slow 5 to Slow 1; 5: Linear; 6-10: Fast 1 to Fast 5

column5: Controls duration of off-state in Flux mode
Controls response curve for off-state in Flux mode
column16: 0-4: Slow 5 to Slow 1; 5: Linear; 6-10: Fast 1 to Fast 5

column5: Controls looper record and overdub functions
Controls looper playback and stop functions
Undoes or redoes the last looper recording
